content: by popular demand i am offering my oliver the bear pattern on ravelry for free slightly_smiling_face before you start you will need - medium weight yarn for body 4 5 oz i used loops and threads impeccable brand in color heather but you can use any color for the body that you want - medium weight yarn for snout and belly hair any white or light colored yarn will work you do not need very much of it - thick yarn for scarf i used loops and threads charisma in color forest - black yarn or embroidery thread for eyes and mouth i just used impeccable brand - safety nose black - 4mm crochet hook - stitch markers - tapestry needle - fiber fill i use classic fiber fill from michaels but you can use any kind you want
